messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, North Wiltshire has been my home since 1967. My late husband and I farmed organically at Sandy Lane. I have two children both educated in local state schools. If elected I will work to hold to account those who would despoil our beautiful area and work for the benefit of North Wilts. Residents. As a former Nurse I believe it is important to fight to improve the NHS and Social Care provision both locally and Nationally. I believe my background in agriculture will help me to support both the farmers and the environment. Yours sincerely, Pat Bryant

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.economy: Fairer tax system; Spend here, not abroad
issues.environment: My background in agriculture will help me to support both the farmers and the environment.
issues.health: Background as a former Nurse; Fight to improve the NHS and Social Care provision both locally and Nationally
issues.immigration: Control our borders with a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system

leaflet.personalStatement: As a former Nurse I believe it is important to fight to improve the NHS and Social Care provision both locally and Nationally. My background in agriculture will help me to support both the farmers and the environment.
